text: When Kamsa saw his strongest wrestlers killed in the hands of Krishna and Balram,
He could no longer control his anger.
Stop this noise at once.
Drive these boys out of Mathura.
Kill Vasudev, Devaki and my father Ugrasen.
(Sounds of  fighting and yelling )
O evil Kamsa, for many many years the earth has been burdened by your sins.
You have been completely arrogant and unrepentant
You imprisoned your own father and younger sister.
You murdered seven newborn babies, just to make sure that you would live to do more evil.
From the day I was born you've tried to kill me in so many ways.
At last you thought that getting me here would be the best way to get rid of me, but you were wrong Kamsa.
This was how you were to receive your own death.
Now,  I stand before you. That means, your time to die has come.
That was the end of Kamsa.
Krishna and Balram went straight to the prison to release Vasudev and Devaki
Vasudev and Devaki were pleased to see their sons.
Just as the celestial voice the Akashavani had foretold.
Krishna came and destroyed the Evil Kamsa and paved the way for good to rule the world again.
But this was not all, in the years to come
Krishna had many more things to accomplish during his mortal life on Earth.
